messages.subject: ruby version
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/25/03 11:36:04 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/25/03 11:36:04 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Oh, dear, then right now I'm not more interesting than the new Ruby
version Pokemon game my son is playing. <g> <sigh> >>

Ha! Trevor just bought that today. We also got Fantasy Star Online and
WindWaker for Gamecube. It's going to be a big old video game bonanza today,
I won't be more interesting than all that for a few days probably.
But I guarantee they will do lots of other stuff, swirling in and around the
games.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
